A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Better as a stand alone movie when you include the inclusiveness and begin/end to a story.  This movie was horrible for the franchise.  How could Disney let one movie completely deconstruct what was created.  I'm okay if you want to create a whole new movie and concept\, but since this is Star Wars and not Peasant Force Wars\, I'm pretty upset they could not find a way to progress the story instead of destroying it.
